remarks: Lemma for ~ ostth .  Refine ~ ostthlem1 so that it is sufficient to only show equality on the primes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-Jun-2015.)
statement:
qrng.q $e |- Q = ( CCfld |`s QQ ) $.
qabsabv.a $e |- A = ( AbsVal ` Q ) $.
ostthlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. A ) $.
ostthlem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> G e. A ) $.
ostthlem2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ p e. Prime ) -> ( F ` p ) = ( G ` p ) ) $.
ostthlem2 $p |- ( ph -> F = G ) $.
$d A p $.
$d F p $.
$d G p $.
$d p ph $.
